column2: Responsibilities include but are not limited to: Brand management Need to have significant experience with the online marketplaces like amazon, flipkart, etc Building selection and terms negotiation: Will be responsible for determining customer market needs, growing selection across subcategories, brands and use cases, managing vendor partners, optimizing vendor terms and getting support for marketing campaigns. Drive efficiency Inventory turns / OTB Management: Will be responsible for operating on industry benchmark inventory turns for the category and generating a positive/self-sustaining business by efficient OTB management Pricing: Responsible for pricing strategy for the category so that we can offer to the customers the best value, value being a combination of price and any convenience. Candidate will also be responsible for using pricing as a lever to ensure efficient cash flow management against the profitability goal. Business planning and communication to senior management: Develop a short-term and long-term plan for growth and report to Senior Management on a regular basis on the state of key topline and bottom-line metrics and risk factors. Joint Planning with Marketplace team: Work closely with the marketplace team to ensure sufficient visibility to our products and jointly participate in the marketing events conducted on the platform. Innovation: Invent and drive continuous process improvement and automation across our systems to allow us to scale a fast growing business. Drive to achieve Sales target. Responsible for budgeting and planning for Sales for specific Category. Planning for Sales Deals and implementing in the market. Negotiate with strong commercial and financial awareness. Excellent Excel Skills Hardworking and ability to meet deadlines  Detail oriented and enthusiastic Reliability and stability  Good communication skills  Prior experience in a Ecommerce company will be an added advantage  Ability to apply high attention to detail.

column2: Title:  Product & Inventory Executive   Job Description: We are seeking a dedicated Inventory and Product Performance Executive to oversee the efficient management of our inventory and product performance. This role will primarily focus on managing product performance within the inventory, placing re-orders, analyzing category-wise sales, coordinating with the marketing team to address slow-moving inventory, updating product prices for liquidation purposes, and analyzing performance metrics on marketplace websites. Responsibilities: Manage      product performance within the inventory to ensure optimal stock levels      and minimize stockouts. Place      re-orders with suppliers to maintain adequate inventory levels and meet      demand forecasts. Analyze      category-wise sales trends and collaborate with the marketing team to      address slow-moving inventory. Update      product prices strategically to facilitate the liquidation of excess      inventory. Analyze      performance metrics on marketplace websites, identify opportunities for      improvement, and implement corrective actions. Develop      and implement strategies to enhance product performance and maximize      profitability. Conduct      regular inventory audits to reconcile physical stock with system records      and identify discrepancies. Collaborate      with cross-functional teams, including purchasing, sales, and marketing,      to optimize inventory and product management processes. Utilize      inventory management software and analytics tools to track product      performance, forecast demand, and generate performance reports. Stay      informed about industry trends and best practices in inventory and product      management to continuously improve processes and procedures. Requirements: Proven      experience in inventory management or product management, preferably in a      retail or e-commerce environment. Strong      analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and make informed      decisions. Excellent      organizational and time management skills with the ability to prioritize      tasks effectively. Proficiency      in inventory management software, analytics tools, and Microsoft Excel. Strong      communication and interpersonal skills with the ability to collaborate      effectively with cross-functional teams. Bachelor's      degree in business administration, supply chain management, marketing, or      a related field (preferred). Attention      to detail and a high level of accuracy in inventory tracking and      reporting. Ability      to thrive in a fast-paced environment and adapt to changing priorities. Knowledge      of inventory control best practices, product management principles, and      industry regulations. Ability      to work independently and take initiative to solve problems and improve processes. Top of Form If you are interested and believe your profile aligns with our job description, kindly share your updated profile at hr@powerlook.in
column11: Inventory Management, Product Performance, Category Management

column2: Our Company :- At nurture.farm, we are putting the farmer at the center of everything we do. We are building a more resilient and sustainable farming ecosystem by reducing risks and improving the quality of life for the farmers and their families through digitization of the farming life cycle, financial inclusion of the farming community, and affordable timely access to products, technologies, advisory and services. We are a technology-led organization, focused on bringing scalable and sustainable solutions to the farming ecosystem. We are a young entrepreneurial startup that wants to learn, create and adapt every day. We aspire to create a happy and productive workplace for our employees, that embodies respect and transparency in every part of the organization. The Opportunity : The candidate will get hands-on experience developing key accounts from scratch. Nurture is looking forward to develop key accounts and build solid processes around this. KAM will launch and develop exclusive label brands on Nurture platform in partnership with Crop Protection, Seed industry leaders. An ideal candidate should have good prior experience of working in the Agro chemical industry. What youll do : 1- Identifying key partners for exclusive label partnerships and finalizing deals with them. 2- Create a mechanism and work with the sales team to get visibility of market operated prices and ensure the best possible prices are listed on the platform for targeted molecules. 3- Prepare annual marketing calendar and work with the Category marketing team to execute the same. 4- Negotiating with partners for additional promotional schemes during the season. 5- Creating a month on month plan for key geographies, key crops and key products to be targeted. 6- Work with Demand planning and sales team to provide the most accurate product level forecast for exclusive label range. 7- Ensuring stock availability with a high degree of forecasting accuracy. 8- Overall responsible for sales to these accounts for the PAN India. Having all their products listed in the platforms, maintaining hygiene across the portal What were looking for :- 1. MBA with 1-3 years hands-on experience in Crop Protection, key account management, vendor management. 2. Prior experience in the Agriculture field with Crop Protection will be preferred. 3. Good working knowledge in excel is required. 4. Candidates having experience of working with category teams in ecommerce setup will be preferred.
column11: Vendor Management, Category Management, Key Accounts

column2: The Seller Support Associate acts as the primary interface between Purplle and our 3rd party sellers, providing phone and/or email support governed by internal service level agreements. The Seller Support Associate will be responsible for providing timely and accurate operational support to 3rd party Sellers. The successful candidate has an immediate, distinct effect on the experience of customers. A Seller Support Associate is expected to address chronic system issues, provide process improvements, develop internal documentation, and contribute to a team environment. Role & responsibilities   Demonstrates effective, clear and professional written and oral communication. Provides prompt and efficient service to Sellers and Merchants including the appropriate escalation of Sellers issues. Maintains a positive and professional demeanor always portraying the company in a positive light and effectively managing sensitive issues. Demonstrates excellent time-management skills and the ability to work independently while using departmental resources, policies and procedures. Contributes to a positive team environment and proactively aids team members with difficult contacts as needed. Maintains acceptable performance metrics such as quality, productivity, first contact resolution, and attendance. Actively seeks solutions through logical reasoning and data interpretation skills and identifies trends to appropriate channel including improvement suggestions. Liaise with other departments such as Customer Service, Merchant Investigations, or Payments teams as required to resolve Sellers issues and questions. Preferred candidate profile   Language: Fluent in English and Korean Demonstrated desire to expand skills into new areas. Technical (Computers & Internet) savvy is required. Desired skill-sets include MS Office Application Excel and Internet Explorer/Chrome Business acumen in areas of e-commerce and retail is advantageous Process improvement awareness and experience Enthusiasm and strong self-motivation. Strong prioritization and time management skills, with a high degree of flexibility. Ability to embrace constant change with flexibility and good grace. Demonstrate appropriate sense of urgency and adaptability in response to changing business needs Demonstrates effective communication, composure, and professional attitude Exemplary performance record, particularly with regard to quality & productivity Ideal Candidate High energy, solution focused with a passion for customer service. The ideal candidate will demonstrate keen logical thinking and analytical skills, with the ability to understand and empathize with sellers. Willingness to work to high performance targets as well as an inquisitive and improvement based approach to work are critical competencies for this role. The Seller Support Associate demonstrates end to end ownership of every seller interaction and couples this with proactive problem solving to provide exceptional support to sellers. Education: Bachelor Degree preferred 6+ months experience within a customer service /contact center environment would be an advantage.
